00042 INT32 GetFreeWorldBombIndex( void )
00043 {
00044       UINT32 uiCount;
00045       WORLDBOMB *newWorldBombs;
00046       UINT32      uiOldNumWorldBombs;
00047 
00048       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumWorldBombs; uiCount++)
00049       {
00050             if ( gWorldBombs[ uiCount ].fExists == FALSE )
00051                   return( (INT32)uiCount );
00052       }
00053 
00054       uiOldNumWorldBombs = guiNumWorldBombs;
00055       guiNumWorldBombs += 10;
00056       //Allocate new table with max+10 items.
00057       newWorldBombs = (WORLDBOMB*)MemRealloc( gWorldBombs, sizeof( WORLDBOMB ) * guiNumWorldBombs );
00058       if (newWorldBombs == NULL)
00059       {
00060             return( -1 );
00061       }
00062 
00063       //Clear the rest of the new array
00064       memset( &newWorldBombs[ uiOldNumWorldBombs ], 0, 
00065             sizeof( WORLDBOMB ) * ( guiNumWorldBombs - uiOldNumWorldBombs ) );
00066       gWorldBombs = newWorldBombs;
00067 
00068       // Return uiCount.....
00069       return( uiCount );
00070 }

00072 
00073 UINT32 GetNumUsedWorldBombs( void )
00074 {
00075       UINT32 uiCount, uiNumItems;
00076       uiNumItems = 0;
00077 
00078       if ( guiNumWorldBombs == 0 )
00079       {
00080             return( 0 );
00081       }
00082 
00083       for( uiCount = 0; uiCount < guiNumWorldBombs; uiCount++ )
00084       {
00085             if( gWorldBombs[ uiCount ].fExists )
00086             {
00087                   uiNumItems++;
00088             }
00089       }
00090 
00091       return( uiNumItems );
00092 }

00096 INT32 AddBombToWorld( INT32 iItemIndex )
00097 {
00098       UINT32      iBombIndex;
00099 
00100       iBombIndex = GetFreeWorldBombIndex( );
00101 
00102       //Add the new world item to the table.
00103       gWorldBombs[ iBombIndex ].fExists                                                         = TRUE;
00104       gWorldBombs[ iBombIndex ].iItemIndex                                                = iItemIndex;
00105 
00106       return ( iBombIndex );
00107 }
00108 
00109 void RemoveBombFromWorld( INT32 iBombIndex )
00110 {
00111       //Remove the world bomb from the table.
00112       gWorldBombs[ iBombIndex ].fExists                                                         = FALSE;
00113 }
00114 
00115 void RemoveBombFromWorldByItemIndex( INT32 iItemIndex )
00116 {
00117       // Find the world bomb which corresponds with a particular world item, then
00118       // remove the world bomb from the table.
00119       UINT32      uiBombIndex;
00120 
00121       for (uiBombIndex = 0; uiBombIndex < guiNumWorldBombs; uiBombIndex++)
00122       {
00123             if (gWorldBombs[ uiBombIndex ].fExists && gWorldBombs[ uiBombIndex].iItemIndex == iItemIndex )
00124             {
00125                   RemoveBombFromWorld( uiBombIndex );
00126                   return;
00127             }
00128       }
00129 }
00130 
00131 INT32 FindWorldItemForBombInGridNo( INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
00132 {
00133       UINT32                              uiBombIndex;
00134 
00135       for (uiBombIndex = 0; uiBombIndex < guiNumWorldBombs; uiBombIndex++)
00136       {
00137             if (gWorldBombs[ uiBombIndex ].fExists && gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[ uiBombIndex ].iItemIndex ].sGridNo == sGridNo && gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[ uiBombIndex ].iItemIndex ].ubLevel == bLevel )
00138             {
00139                   return( gWorldBombs[ uiBombIndex ].iItemIndex );
00140             }
00141       }
00142       return( -1 );
00143 }

00145 
00146 void FindPanicBombsAndTriggers( void )
00147 {
00148       // This function searches the bomb table to find panic-trigger-tuned bombs and triggers
00149 
00150       UINT32                  uiBombIndex;
00151       OBJECTTYPE *      pObj;
00152       STRUCTURE *       pSwitch;
00153       INT16             sGridNo = NOWHERE;
00154       INT8              bPanicIndex;
00155       BOOLEAN                 fPanicTriggerIsAlarm = FALSE;
00156       
00157       for (uiBombIndex = 0; uiBombIndex < guiNumWorldBombs; uiBombIndex++)
00158       {
00159             if (gWorldBombs[ uiBombIndex ].fExists)
00160             {
00161                   pObj = &(gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[ uiBombIndex ].iItemIndex ].o);
00162                   if (pObj->bFrequency == PANIC_FREQUENCY || pObj->bFrequency == PANIC_FREQUENCY_2 || pObj->bFrequency == PANIC_FREQUENCY_3 )
00163                   {
00164                         if (pObj->usItem == SWITCH)
00165                         {
00166                               sGridNo = gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[ uiBombIndex ].iItemIndex ].sGridNo;
00167                               switch( pObj->bFrequency )
00168                               {
00169                                     case PANIC_FREQUENCY:
00170                                           bPanicIndex = 0;
00171                                           break;
00172 
00173                                     case PANIC_FREQUENCY_2:
00174                                           bPanicIndex = 1;
00175                                           break;
00176 
00177                                     case PANIC_FREQUENCY_3:
00178                                           bPanicIndex = 2;
00179                                           break;
00180                                     
00181                                     default:
00182                                           // augh!!!
00183                                           continue;
00184                               }
00185 
00186                               pSwitch = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_SWITCH );
00187                               if (pSwitch)
00188                               {
00189                                     switch( pSwitch->ubWallOrientation ) 
00190                                     {
00191                                           case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00192                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:                          
00193                                                 sGridNo += DirectionInc( SOUTH );
00194                                                 break;
00195                                           case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00196                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00197                                                 sGridNo += DirectionInc( EAST );
00198                                                 break;
00199                                           default:
00200                                                 break;
00201                                     }
00202                               }
00203 
00204                               gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[ bPanicIndex ] = sGridNo;
00205                               gTacticalStatus.ubPanicTolerance[ bPanicIndex ] = pObj->ubTolerance;
00206                               if (pObj->fFlags & OBJECT_ALARM_TRIGGER)
00207                               {
00208                                     gTacticalStatus.bPanicTriggerIsAlarm[ bPanicIndex ] = TRUE;
00209                               }
00210                               gTacticalStatus.fPanicFlags |= PANIC_TRIGGERS_HERE;
00211                               bPanicIndex++;
00212                               if (bPanicIndex == NUM_PANIC_TRIGGERS)
00213                               {
00214                                     return;
00215                               }
00216                         }
00217                         else
00218                         {
00219                               gTacticalStatus.fPanicFlags |= PANIC_BOMBS_HERE;
00220                         }
00221                   }
00222             }
00223       }
00224 }

00226 INT32 GetFreeWorldItemIndex( void )
00227 {
00228       UINT32 uiCount;
00229       WORLDITEM *newWorldItems;
00230       UINT32      uiOldNumWorldItems;
00231 
00232       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumWorldItems; uiCount++)
00233       {
00234             if ( gWorldItems[ uiCount ].fExists == FALSE )
00235                   return( (INT32)uiCount );
00236       }
00237 
00238       uiOldNumWorldItems = guiNumWorldItems;
00239       guiNumWorldItems += 10;
00240       //Allocate new table with max+10 items.
00241       newWorldItems = (WORLDITEM*)MemRealloc( gWorldItems, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * guiNumWorldItems );
00242       if (newWorldItems == NULL)
00243       {
00244             return( -1 );
00245       }
00246 
00247       //Clear the rest of the new array
00248       memset( &newWorldItems[ uiOldNumWorldItems ], 0, 
00249             sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * ( guiNumWorldItems - uiOldNumWorldItems ) );
00250       gWorldItems = newWorldItems;
00251 
00252       // Return uiCount.....
00253       return( uiCount );
00254 }

00260       uiNumItems = 0;
00261

00264             return( 0 );

00280 INT32 AddItemToWorld( INT16 sGridNo, OBJECTTYPE *pObject, UINT8 ubLevel, UINT16 usFlags, INT8 bRenderZHeightAboveLevel, INT8 bVisible )
00281 {
00282       UINT32      iItemIndex;
00283       INT32       iReturn;
00284 
00285       // ATE: Check if the gridno is OK
00286       if ( (sGridNo) == NOWHERE )
00287       {
00288             // Display warning.....
00289             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00290                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Error: Item %d was given invalid grid location %d. Please report", pObject->usItem, sGridNo);
00291             #endif
00292             return( -1 );
00293       }
00294 
00295       iItemIndex = GetFreeWorldItemIndex( );
00296 
00297       //Add the new world item to the table.
00298       gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].fExists                                                         = TRUE;
00299       gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].sGridNo                                                         = sGridNo;
00300       gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].ubLevel                                                         = ubLevel;
00301       gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].usFlags                                                         = usFlags;
00302       gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].bVisible                                                  = bVisible;
00303       gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].bRenderZHeightAboveLevel  = bRenderZHeightAboveLevel;
00304 
00305       memcpy( &(gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].o), pObject, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
00306 
00307       // Add a bomb reference if needed
00308       if (usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_ARMED_BOMB)
00309       {
00310             iReturn = AddBombToWorld( iItemIndex );
00311             if (iReturn == -1)
00312             {
00313                   return( -1 );
00314             }
00315       }
00316 
00317       return ( iItemIndex );
00318 }
00319 
00320 void RemoveItemFromWorld( INT32 iItemIndex )
00321 {
00322       // Ensure the item still exists, then if it's a bomb,
00323       // remove the appropriate entry from the bomb table
00324       if (gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].fExists)
00325       {
00326             if (gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_ARMED_BOMB)
00327             {
00328                   RemoveBombFromWorldByItemIndex( iItemIndex );
00329             }
00330             gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].fExists = FALSE;
00331       }
00332 }
00333 
00334 void TrashWorldItems()
00335 {
00336       UINT32 i;
00337       if( gWorldItems )
00338       {
00339             for( i = 0; i < guiNumWorldItems; i++ )
00340             {
00341                   if( gWorldItems[ i ].fExists )
00342                   {
00343                         RemoveItemFromPool( gWorldItems[ i ].sGridNo, i, gWorldItems[ i ].ubLevel );
00344                   }
00345             }
00346             MemFree( gWorldItems );
00347             gWorldItems = NULL;
00348             guiNumWorldItems = 0;
00349       }
00350       if ( gWorldBombs )
00351       {
00352             MemFree( gWorldBombs );
00353             gWorldBombs = NULL;
00354             guiNumWorldBombs = 0;
00355       }
00356 }

00358 
00359 void SaveWorldItemsToMap( HWFILE fp )
00360 {
00361       UINT32 i, uiBytesWritten;
00362       UINT32            uiActualNumWorldItems;
00363 
00364 
00365       uiActualNumWorldItems = GetNumUsedWorldItems( );
00366 
00367       FileWrite( fp, &uiActualNumWorldItems, 4, &uiBytesWritten );
00368 
00369       for( i = 0; i < guiNumWorldItems; i++ )
00370       {
00371             if( gWorldItems[ i ].fExists )
00372                   FileWrite( fp, &gWorldItems[ i ], sizeof( WORLDITEM ), &uiBytesWritten );
00373       }
00374 }

00377 void LoadWorldItemsFromMap( INT8 **hBuffer )
00378 {
00379       // Start loading itmes...
00380       
00381       UINT32                  i;
00382       WORLDITEM         dummyItem;
00383       INT32                   iItemIndex;
00384       UINT32                  uiNumWorldItems;
00385       UINT32                  uiLevelItems = 0;
00386             
00387       //If any world items exist, we must delete them now.
00388       TrashWorldItems();
00389 
00390       //Read the number of items that were saved in the map.
00391       LOADDATA( &uiNumWorldItems, *hBuffer, 4 );
00392 
00393       if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME && !gfEditMode )
00394       { //The sector has already been visited.  The items are saved in a different format that will be 
00395             //loaded later on.  So, all we need to do is skip the data entirely.
00396             *hBuffer += sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiNumWorldItems;
00397             return;
00398       }
00399       else for ( i = 0; i < uiNumWorldItems; i++ )
00400       {     //Add all of the items to the world indirectly through AddItemToPool, but only if the chance
00401             //associated with them succeed.
00402             LOADDATA( &dummyItem, *hBuffer, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) );
00403             if( dummyItem.o.usItem == OWNERSHIP )
00404             {
00405                   dummyItem.ubNonExistChance = 0;
00406             }
00407             if( gfEditMode || dummyItem.ubNonExistChance <= PreRandom( 100 ) )
00408             {
00409                   if( !gfEditMode )
00410                   { 
00411                         //check for matching item existance modes and only add if there is a match!
00412                         //if we are in platinum mode, REALISTIC items are allowed, but not SCIFI items
00413                         if( dummyItem.usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_SCIFI_ONLY && !(gGameOptions.ubGameStyle == STYLE_SCIFI) ||
00414                                 dummyItem.usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_REALISTIC_ONLY && (gGameOptions.ubGameStyle == STYLE_SCIFI) )
00415                         { //no match, so don't add item to world
00416                               continue;
00417                         }
00418 /*
00419                         if ( !gGameOptions.fGunNut )
00420                         {
00421                               UINT16      usReplacement;
00422 
00423                               // do replacements?
00424                               if ( Item[ dummyItem.o.usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
00425                               {
00426                                     INT8        bAmmo, bNewAmmo;
00427 
00428                                     usReplacement = StandardGunListReplacement( dummyItem.o.usItem );
00429                                     if ( usReplacement )
00430                                     {
00431                                           // everything else can be the same? no.
00432                                           bAmmo = dummyItem.o.ubGunShotsLeft;
00433                                           bNewAmmo = (Weapon[ usReplacement ].ubMagSize * bAmmo) / Weapon[ dummyItem.o.usItem ].ubMagSize;
00434                                           if ( bAmmo > 0 && bNewAmmo == 0 )
00435                                           {
00436                                                 bNewAmmo = 1;
00437                                           }
00438 
00439                                           dummyItem.o.usItem = usReplacement;
00440                                           dummyItem.o.ubGunShotsLeft = bNewAmmo;
00441                                     }
00442                               }
00443                               if ( Item[ dummyItem.o.usItem ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO )
00444                               {
00445                                     usReplacement = StandardGunListAmmoReplacement( dummyItem.o.usItem );
00446                                     if ( usReplacement )
00447                                     {
00448                                           UINT8       ubLoop;
00449 
00450                                           // go through status values and scale up/down
00451                                           for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < dummyItem.o.ubNumberOfObjects; ubLoop++ )
00452                                           {
00453                                                 dummyItem.o.bStatus[ ubLoop ] = dummyItem.o.bStatus[ ubLoop ] * Magazine[ Item[ usReplacement ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize / Magazine[ Item[ dummyItem.o.usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize; 
00454                                           }
00455 
00456                                           // then replace item #
00457                                           dummyItem.o.usItem = usReplacement;
00458                                     }
00459                               }
00460                         }
00461 
00462 */
00463                   }
00464                   if( dummyItem.o.usItem == ACTION_ITEM && gfLoadPitsWithoutArming )
00465                   { //if we are loading a pit, they are typically loaded without being armed.
00466                         if( dummyItem.o.bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_SMALL_PIT || dummyItem.o.bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_LARGE_PIT )
00467                         {
00468                               dummyItem.usFlags &= ~WORLD_ITEM_ARMED_BOMB;
00469                               dummyItem.bVisible = BURIED;
00470                               dummyItem.o.bDetonatorType = 0;
00471                         }
00472                   }
00473                   
00474                   else if ( dummyItem.bVisible == HIDDEN_ITEM && dummyItem.o.bTrap > 0 && ( Item[dummyItem.o.usItem].mine || dummyItem.o.usItem == TRIP_FLARE || dummyItem.o.usItem == TRIP_KLAXON) )
00475                   {
00476                         ArmBomb( &dummyItem.o, BOMB_PRESSURE );
00477                         dummyItem.usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_ARMED_BOMB;
00478                         // this is coming from the map so the enemy must know about it.
00479                         gpWorldLevelData[ dummyItem.sGridNo ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_ENEMY_MINE_PRESENT;
00480 
00481                   }
00482 
00483                   if ( dummyItem.usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_ARMED_BOMB )
00484                   { //all armed bombs are buried
00485                         dummyItem.bVisible = BURIED;
00486                   }
00487                   AddItemToPoolAndGetIndex( dummyItem.sGridNo, &dummyItem.o, dummyItem.bVisible, dummyItem.ubLevel, dummyItem.usFlags, dummyItem.bRenderZHeightAboveLevel, &iItemIndex );
00488                   gWorldItems[ iItemIndex ].ubNonExistChance = dummyItem.ubNonExistChance;
00489             }
00490       }
00491 
00492       if ( !gfEditMode )
00493       {     
00494             DeleteWorldItemsBelongingToTerroristsWhoAreNotThere();
00495             if ( gWorldSectorX == 3 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_P && gbWorldSectorZ == 1 )
00496             {
00497                   DeleteWorldItemsBelongingToQueenIfThere();
00498             }
00499       }
00500 }
00501 
00502 void DeleteWorldItemsBelongingToTerroristsWhoAreNotThere( void )
00503 {
00504       UINT32      uiLoop;
00505       UINT32      uiLoop2;
00506       INT16       sGridNo;
00507       UINT8       ubLevel;
00508 
00509       // only do this after Carmen has talked to player and terrorists have been placed
00510       //if ( CheckFact( FACT_CARMEN_EXPLAINED_DEAL, 0 ) == TRUE )
00511       {
00512 
00513             for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumWorldItems; uiLoop++ )
00514             {
00515                   // loop through all items, look for ownership
00516                   if ( gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].fExists && gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].o.usItem == OWNERSHIP )
00517                   {
00518                         // if owner is a terrorist
00519                         if ( IsProfileATerrorist( gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].o.ubOwnerProfile ) )
00520                         {
00521                               // and they were not set in the current sector
00522                               if ( gMercProfiles[ gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].o.ubOwnerProfile ].sSectorX != gWorldSectorX ||
00523                                     gMercProfiles[ gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].o.ubOwnerProfile ].sSectorY != gWorldSectorY )
00524                               {
00525                                     // then all items in this location should be deleted
00526                                     sGridNo = gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].sGridNo;
00527                                     ubLevel = gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].ubLevel;
00528                                     for ( uiLoop2 = 0; uiLoop2 < guiNumWorldItems; uiLoop2++ )
00529                                     {
00530                                           // loop through all items, look for ownership
00531                                           if ( gWorldItems[ uiLoop2 ].fExists && gWorldItems[ uiLoop2 ].sGridNo == sGridNo && gWorldItems[ uiLoop2 ].ubLevel == ubLevel )
00532                                           {
00533                                                 RemoveItemFromPool( sGridNo, uiLoop2, ubLevel );
00534                                           }
00535                                     }
00536                               }
00537                         }
00538                   }
00539             }
00540       }
00541       // else the terrorists haven't been placed yet!
00542 }
00543 
00544 void DeleteWorldItemsBelongingToQueenIfThere( void )
00545 {
00546       UINT32      uiLoop;
00547       UINT32      uiLoop2;
00548       INT16       sGridNo;
00549       UINT8       ubLevel;
00550       INT8        bSlot;
00551 
00552       if ( gMercProfiles[ QUEEN ].sSectorX == gWorldSectorX &&
00553             gMercProfiles[ QUEEN ].sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && 
00554             gMercProfiles[ QUEEN ].bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
00555       {
00556 
00557             for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumWorldItems; uiLoop++ )
00558             {
00559                   // loop through all items, look for ownership
00560                   if ( gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].fExists && gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].o.usItem == OWNERSHIP )
00561                   {
00562                         // if owner is the Queen
00563                         if ( gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].o.ubOwnerProfile == QUEEN )
00564                         {
00565                               // then all items in this location should be deleted
00566                               sGridNo = gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].sGridNo;
00567                               ubLevel = gWorldItems[ uiLoop ].ubLevel;
00568                               for ( uiLoop2 = 0; uiLoop2 < guiNumWorldItems; uiLoop2++ )
00569                               {
00570                                     // loop through all items, look for those in same tile
00571                                     if ( gWorldItems[ uiLoop2 ].fExists && gWorldItems[ uiLoop2 ].sGridNo == sGridNo && gWorldItems[ uiLoop2 ].ubLevel == ubLevel )
00572                                     {
00573                                           // upgrade equipment
00574                                           switch ( gWorldItems[ uiLoop2 ].o.usItem )
00575                                           {
00576                                                 case AUTO_ROCKET_RIFLE:
00577                                                       bSlot = FindObjectInSoldierProfile( QUEEN, ROCKET_RIFLE );
00578                                                       if ( bSlot != NO_SLOT )
00579                                                       {
00580                                                             // give her auto rifle
00581                                                             gMercProfiles[ QUEEN ].inv[ bSlot ] = AUTO_ROCKET_RIFLE;
00582                                                       }
00583                                                       break;
00584                                                 case SPECTRA_HELMET_18:
00585                                                       gMercProfiles[ QUEEN ].inv[ HELMETPOS ] = SPECTRA_HELMET_18;
00586                                                       break;
00587                                                 case SPECTRA_VEST_18:
00588                                                       gMercProfiles[ QUEEN ].inv[ VESTPOS ] = SPECTRA_VEST_18;
00589                                                       break;
00590                                                 case SPECTRA_LEGGINGS_18:
00591                                                       gMercProfiles[ QUEEN ].inv[ LEGPOS ] = SPECTRA_LEGGINGS_18;
00592                                                       break;
00593                                                 default:
00594                                                       break;
00595                                           }
00596                                           RemoveItemFromPool( sGridNo, uiLoop2, ubLevel );
00597                                     }
00598                               }
00599                         }
00600                   }
00601             }
00602       }
00603 }

00605 
00606 // Refresh item pools
00607 void RefreshWorldItemsIntoItemPools( WORLDITEM * pItemList, INT32 iNumberOfItems )
00608 {
00609       INT32             i;
00610       WORLDITEM         dummyItem;
00611 
00612       for ( i = 0; i < iNumberOfItems; i++ )
00613       {     
00614             if( pItemList[ i ].fExists )
00615             {
00616                   memcpy( &dummyItem, &( pItemList[ i ] ), sizeof( WORLDITEM ) );
00617 
00618                   AddItemToPool( dummyItem.sGridNo, &dummyItem.o, dummyItem.bVisible, dummyItem.ubLevel, dummyItem.usFlags, dummyItem.bRenderZHeightAboveLevel );
00619             }
00620       }
00621 
00622 }
